name: Shadow President: ◬ Illuminati
description:
The Dirty Politics Adventure.

How would it feel to  be the man/woman behind the power of the presidency? The person pulling the string behind the scenes.

Now you can find out how it is to be one of the most powerful people in the world.

  • Rule the world from your smart phone
  • Chat and make deals with world leaders
  • Earn Bytecoins making huge deals
  • Your decisions have a direct effect on the world
